page.title: 15HAYES FARM CARAVAN SITE
page.content: This seasonal caravan site is situated halfway down B1012 adjoining the River Crouch, with a frontage of 450m.The 24 acre site offers space for 75 touring caravans and 314 residential caravans. It opens at the end of March and closes October 27th. It primarily provides Summer homes for people living in the East End of London. The facilities available are toilets, showers, launderette, telephone, and shop. For entertainment there is a club with a licensed bar serving snacks, and offering pool, darts, jukebox and TV. Weekly discos and bingo are also held there. In addition there is an amusement arcade. The tidal river offers water ski-ing, windsurfing, sailing, canoeing, and a launching ramp. Each caravan can be supplied with electricity and gas. The
